ComicInfo.Summary: The Mission Who Walks Like a Man [Part 2]: With the Enterprise crew evacuated to the planet Circe V, Kirk remains alone on the ship to battle Gary Seven. When Gary Seven gets the upper hand, he orders Kirk to crash the Enterprise on Circe V to kill the crew.
